TopicTitle: The Terran Empire(littlecheese999) VS Feller Empire (fascka)

Articles.Content:
hey guys, im doing a mutiplayer war game(pass the save) with fascka, and we thought we would blog about it, so......BATTLE STATIONS KERBALS!!!

fascka's Thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/48809-The-Feller-Empire-fighting-against-The-Terran-Empire-%28pass-the-save-war-game%29

Terran Empire Stats

1 loss

Turn 1

ok so it was my turn first and after many failed attempts to launch the "Titan" i launched the "Stingray"

Its is a small fighter ship, i left part of the launch stage on cause it had quite a bit of fuel in it

Turn 2

in this turn i tried getting the "Titan" in orbit again, i had to make some heavy adjustments but it worked! and still has some of the launch stage

it has 6 missiles, but during testing when it crashed(a lot) i couldn't seem to break the armor (WIN)

Turn 3

i launched a space station core and docked the "Titan" to it planning on docking some small fighters and maybe a few other medium ships and sending it as a "all in one attack fleet" to what ever target i need dead (evil grin)

and i found out that the evil Feller Empire shot at are Titan in there turn! it missed but tensions are brewing.....

Turn 4

i launched a craft with 2 small fighters intro orbit, docking next turn i have jeb and bill in these things, so there "expect" pilot skills may come in handy

Turn 5

docked the fighters to station and launched ammo for them, docking next turn

Fighter docking

both docked

ammo carrier in orbit

Turn 6 1 loss

OH NO

the stingray was attacked! those filthy feller scum, they didnt damage it thought, only the launch stage

so i fly away to attack a feller ship!

i fire but...my missiles suck! they go at less than 5ms, (i made new ones and tested them, they r good now) so i only have one option...ram it!

my kerbal died we dont know the loss of the other side...

i launched the Stingray MK2 with working missiles...

they also destroyed the ammo carrier, but i dont care they didnt work and it was unmanned

Edited September 6, 2013 by littlecheese999
I will blow the hell out of that ammo carrier
You'll be surprised at how hard targeting really is unless you're under 100 meters.

NOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i need that....for...reasons which may or may not involve killing you

Edited September 6, 2013 by littlecheese999
